name: rephlo-sites
description: Rephlo Sites - Monorepo for Frontend, Backend, and Identity Provider

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "frontend,backend,idp" -c "cyan,green,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix identity-provider"
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix identity-provider
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix identity-provider
